explanation: [0-0] An animated scene with a green lawn in the background, a Cameroonian football player with dark skin and wearing a green tracksuit is supporting himself on his right leg with his left leg bent and raised, making a fist with his right hand raised.

[0-2] The Cameroonian football player is dribbling forward while running. At this time, a Serbian defender in a white uniform enters the scene from the left side of the frame and attempts to block the shot, sliding a tackle to the right side of the frame. Then, the Serbian goalkeeper, dressed in a black tracksuit, leans forward with his hands outstretched, ready to save. Subsequently, the Cameroonian player kicks the ball into the air.
